page.title: 07Home Life, Stickney.
page.content: On Saturday I got up early, to go gliding. My mum took me to the end of West Fen Lane to wait to be picked up to go gliding with the scouts. The scout leaders wife picked my friend and I up at 8.30 am and took us to st Rubby air field. We helped to get the gliders ready ,then walked to the runway while the winch was prepared. A winch is something which pulls the glider into the air.I was scared when I first went up,but when I got used to it,I enjoyed it. After we had finished gliding we went home for lunch.After lunch I played outside with my friend.In the evening I got changed. My uncle and aunt were taking us for a meal and to see the Grumbleweeds.They were everso good.We went home at 12.10 am .I was very tired. I went straight to bed.
